content: Hi there! Welcome to BPI. How can I assist you with your banking needs today?

suggestions.suggestion: Hi there! Welcome to BPI. How can I assist you with your banking needs today?

content: how do I use online service

Hi there! You can easily access our online service, BPI Online, by logging in to our website or through our mobile app. Once you're logged in, you can view your account balances, pay bills, and transfer funds. If you need help with your login credentials or have questions about using our online service, feel free to ask and I'll be happy to assist you.

content: give me all the info you have in the document

For new clients, online account opening is restricted to the #SaveUp account and can only be done via the BPI App. The process requires a photo of a valid ID and a selfie for identity verification. For in-branch account opening, a minimum deposit and at least one valid ID are needed. Employed or business applicants must also submit proof of income documents like payslips, Certificate of Employment (COE), or DTI/SEC permit as part of the Know-Your-Client (KYC) procedure.

suggestions.suggestion: For new clients, online account opening is restricted to the #SaveUp account and can only be done via the BPI App. The process requires a photo of a valid ID and a selfie for identity verification. For in-branch account opening, a minimum deposit and at least one valid ID are needed. Employed or business applicants must also submit proof of income documents like payslips, Certificate of Employment (COE), or DTI/SEC permit as part of the Know-Your-Client (KYC) procedure.

BPI offers credit cards with different income requirements: the BPI Rewards Card requires a minimum monthly income of Php 15,000 and earns 1 point per Php 35 spend, offers travel insurance up to Php 2 million, and provides flexible installment terms. The BPI Gold Rewards Card requires Php 40,000 monthly income, also earns 1 point per Php 35 spend, and provides up to Php 10 million in free travel insurance.

Be aware that foreign transaction fees may apply even on local currency charges for subscriptions and Amazon purchases. This is a common point of customer confusion, so always check the latest fee schedule on the BPI website or contact customer service for clarification on specific transactions.

A foundational requirement for all BPI account and loan applications is the submission of at least one valid, unexpired, government-issued photo-bearing ID. The bank accepts a broad list of identification documents including PhilID, Passport, Driver's License, SSS ID, PRC ID, and UMID.

Documentation requirements for BPI loan applications are conditional and depend on the applicant's profile and source of income. For specific loan types and their requirements, visit the BPI website or speak with a loan specialist who can guide you through the exact documents needed based on your employment status and income source.
